album.title: A Rush of Blood to the Head

wiki.content: This song was written by Chris Martin in 2002 while the band was waiting to perform in Amsterdam. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: This song was written by Chris Martin in 2002 while the band was waiting to perform in Amsterdam.

track.name: Amsterdam
comments: I have chills all over my body
one of the greatest, most heartbreaking songs i've ever heard. instant goosebumps
I'd kill to hear this live. Indescribably beautiful. [2]
I know I'm dead on the surface, But I am screaming underneath.
god, this one is definitely the cream of the crop. i'm on my way back down again~
for me this is coldplay
I don't care who you are..this song right here is GREAT!
Their best song [4]
So much better than Clocks or Charlie Brown. This is where it's at.
Their best song [3]
They could play Amsterdam more often, this song is amazing.
so beautiful
Their best song [2]
Their best song
♥ I don't know why but I want this to be played at my funeral. Sad but beautiful.
v this is actually hard to believe.
This is my favorite song of all-time.
So beautiful.
